D

DatabaseStringGenerator - Interface in entitytype.generator
Generates a database-specific string representation for a given set of JPA entity types.
DatabaseStringGeneratorImpl - Class in entitytype.generator.impl
Utility class for analyzing the JPA metamodel and the underlying database schema.

Generates a domain-specific string representation for a given set of JPA entity types.

Executes the given SQL query and returns any error messages if execution fails.
getErrorsFor(String) - Method in interface service.ServiceSql
Executes the given SQL query and collects and returns error messages if execution fails, therefore returns an empty string if execution is successful.
getFullPrompt(String) - Method in interface entitytype.EntityTypeSelection
Assembles the full prompt for SQL query generation by combining the configured prefix, the user-defined prompt, the postfix, the domain string and the database string.

Service interface for SQL dialect information and query validation.

SimpleEntityTypeSelection - Class in entitytype
Simple data structure for managing the selection state of a set of JPA entity types, along with configuration for prompt generation and string representation.
SimpleEntityTypeSelection(Set<EntityType<?>>) - Constructor for class entitytype.SimpleEntityTypeSelection
Creates a new selection object with all provided entity types initially selected.

UMLGenerator - Interface in entitytype.generator
Generates a UML diagram as an image stream for a given set of JPA entity types.
